segments.text: He's only interested in harassing you . How can he expect us to have so much time to waste ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I almost want to send him a virus to shut his stupid computer down .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: As obnoxious as Bean is , we should still try to finish this case .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: True-well , do you have any forwards for me to send him ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah ! Remember that one about putting light bulbs in your mouth ?
segments.speaker: S1
